title: Chelsea rival Arsenal and Liverpool for Sead Kolasinac transfer
text:
Sead Kolasinac is sparking a transfer battle this January (Picture: Getty) Chelsea are reportedly ready to make a move to rival the likes of Arsenal , Liverpool and Juventus for the transfer of Schalke left-back Sead Kolasinac.
40-games unbeaten! Real Madrid break Barcelona record in most dramatic style The Blues only signed current first choice left wing-back Marcos Alonso last summer, but there has been recent speculation that Antonio Conte hasn’t been entirely convinced by his performances.
This has also seen Chelsea linked with a move for Cologne left-back Jonas Hector to fill that position, and it is now claimed that Kolasinac is a target as well.

Kolasinac has shone for Bundesliga side Schalke (Picture: Getty) Conte is a known perfectionist and Sky Italia claim he could try to beat clubs to Kolasinac this January as he sets his sights on continuing his side’s march towards the Premier League title.
The Bosnia international is also being linked with Arsenal and Liverpool after his impressive form in the Bundesliga.
Chelsea have also been linked with a move to strengthen on the right-hand side of their defence with a move for West Ham full-back Michail Antonio .
